headline: Kroger Scales Generative AI Strategy with Google Cloud to Drive Digital Growth and Personalization
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced an expanded relationship with Google Cloud. The leading grocery chain will use the Gemini Enterprise for Customer Experience (CX) solution to support its customer experience transformation, combining cutting-edge technology with the care, food knowledge and understanding customers expect from Kroger – all into a new personal shopping assistant.

content.title: Kroger Scales Generative AI Strategy with Google Cloud to Drive Digital Growth and Personalization

The leading grocery chain will use the Gemini Enterprise for Customer Experience (CX) solution to support its customer experience transformation, combining cutting-edge technology with the care, food knowledge and understanding customers expect from Kroger – all into a new personal shopping assistant.

headline: Google Cloud Brings Shopping and Customer Service Together with Gemini Enterprise for Customer Experience
summary: Today at NRF 2026, Google Cloud unveiled Gemini Enterprise for Customer Experience (CX), an agentic solution designed to bring shopping and customer service together on a single intelligent interface for businesses, including retailers and restaurants. The solution introduces new prebuilt and configurable agents that are developed using Google's latest Gemini models and can be quickly deployed in days. With Gemini Enterprise for CX, businesses can manage agents across the entire customer lifecyc
